title: Got flagged by the game for "AFK" by playing Evelyn on ARAM

replies.body: My only guess at this point is that the system looks at CS (on a non-support) as an indicator of AFK behavior, although that's kind of weird for ARAM. Did the Wukong with similar low CS get marked AFK as well?
that's so weiiiird. Just from your kda I can tell you weren't afk. Maybe you can try sending a ticket to riot? Once they see it I'm pretty sure they'll reverse it
